message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional capabilities and benefits, the product is valued at $1500000 by you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire it at a special introductory price of $1200000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an outstanding investment that could potentially yield substantial returns on your expenditure. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing the details further with you.
